content: SLR Investment Corp. net asset value at June 30, 2022, was $1.02 billion or $18.53 per share compared to $826.4 million or $19.56 per share at month 31, 2022, prior to the closing of the merger with SLRC Investment Corp. At June 30, 2022, SLRC's on-balance sheet investment portfolio had a fair market value of approximately $2.0 billion in 127 portfolio companies across 40 industries compared to a fair market value of $1.63 billion in 101 portfolio companies across 33 industries at month 31, 2022.
